channel.title: [PI]Help
channel.description:
1. When I use rune arrows or rune knives, instead of throwing the rune missile, it appears that am throwing steel knives but am hitting as I had rune knives, Its the anim right?, anyone got it? and where should I put it? And I can't recolect my arrows/knives :P
2. Ok,when I use clean torstol with vial of water y makes a Zamorak Brew, how can I change what pot to make?
Thats all what I need help, I guess :P, thanks!
Heinz

item.title: [PI]Help
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

219-225 = throwing knives graphics
You would just find out where range is handled and make: if is attacking with rune knives, send gfx ###.

For the Herblore one, that is a simple fix. Just see where your herblore is handles and search for the id of Torstol.

Read full topic
